tool.name: OGS: IntegrateBoreholesIntoMesh
tool.description: Galaxy wrapper for the OGS utility 'IntegrateBoreholesIntoMesh'.
tool.command: if [ "$geo" != "None" ] && [ ! -e '${$geo.element_identifier}' ]; then ln -s '$geo' '${$geo.element_identifier}'; fi; if [ "$input" != "None" ] && [ ! -e '${$input.element_identifier}' ]; then ln -s '$input' '${$input.element_identifier}'; fi; IntegrateBoreholesIntoMesh #if str($max_elevation).strip() != 'None' and str($max_elevation).strip() != '': --max-elevation '$max_elevation' #end if #if str($min_elevation).strip() != 'None' and str($min_elevation).strip() != '': --min-elevation '$min_elevation' #end if #if str($max_id).strip() != 'None' and str($max_id).strip() != '': --max-id '$max_id' #end if #if str($min_id).strip() != 'None' and str($min_id).strip() != '': --min-id '$min_id' #end if --geo '$geo.element_identifier' --input '$input.element_identifier' --output output_1.vtu

param.name: max_elevation
param.label: max elevation
param.help: Maximum elevation for an integrated borehole, (min = 0)

param.name: min_elevation
param.label: min elevation
param.help: Minimum elevation for an integrated borehole, (min = 0)

param.name: max_id
param.label: max id
param.help: Maximum MaterialID for an integrated borehole

param.name: min_id
param.label: min id
param.help: Minimum MaterialID for an integrated borehole

tool.help: This tool runs the **IntegrateBoreholesIntoMesh** utility from the OpenGeoSys suite.
